attributes.action: The Government should look into the rising costs of motor insurance
attributes.additional_details: Puts more pressure on the general public who are currently under a cost of living crisis.
attributes.background: Government to discuss and look into the rising cost of motor insurance which currently stands at 58%

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
